name: Lion
description: The lion is a majestic animal with a shaggy mane and a loud roar.

name: Giraffe
description: The giraffe is a tall, gentle animal with a long neck and spotted fur.

name: Monkey
description: The monkey is a agile, curious animal that lives in trees.

name: Antelope
description: Graceful herbivores with horns, found in Africa and Asia.

name: Camel
description: Desert animals with humps that store fat.

name: Dolphin
description: Smart, playful marine mammals.

name: Eagle
description: Majestic birds of prey with sharp vision.

name: Frog
description: Amphibians known for leaping and croaking.

name: Hawk
description: Fast-flying birds of prey.

name: Iguana
description: Large lizards with spiny crests.

name: Koala
description: Tree-dwelling marsupials from Australia.

name: Quail
description: Small, ground-dwelling birds.

name: Rabbit
description: Small mammals with long ears.

name: Snake
description: Legless reptiles that slither.

name: Walrus
description: Large marine mammals with tusks.

name: Aardvark
description: The aardvark is a nocturnal mammal native to Africa. It has a long snout and ears similar to a rabbit's, and it primarily feeds on ants and termites.

name: Bear Bears
description: re large mammals found in various habitats across the world. They are omnivorous and known for their strength and intelligence, with species like the grizzly and polar bear being particularly well-known.

name: Cat
description: is a small, domesticated carnivore known for its playful and independent nature. Weighing 5 to 20 pounds, they have soft fur and excellent night vision. Cats communicate through meows and purrs, live 12 to 15 years, and are cherished as pets.

name: Dog
description: is a domesticated mammal, a descendant of the gray wolf. Known for loyalty, they come in various breeds and sizes, are intelligent, and can be trained for tasks. Dogs typically live 10 to 15 years..

name: Elephant
description: is the largest land animal, recognized for its long trunk and large ears. They are social creatures that live in matriarchal herds and are known for their intelligence and memory.

name: Falcon
description: are birds of prey known for their speed and keen eyesight. They can dive at incredible speeds to catch their prey, making them skilled hunters.

name: Hippopotamus
description: is a large, mostly herbivorous mammal found in sub-Saharan Africa. They spend much of their time in water to keep cool and are known for their powerful jaws.

name: Iguana
description: large lizards native to Central and South America. They are primarily herbivorous and are known for their distinctive dewlap and ability to change color.

name: Jaguar
description: is a large cat native to the Americas, known for its powerful build and beautiful rosette-patterned coat. They are excellent swimmers and often hunt in water.

name: Kangaroo
description: marsupials native to Australia, known for their powerful hind legs and ability to hop. They are social animals that live in groups called mobs.

name: Narwhal
description: is a medium-sized whale known for its long, spiral tusk, which is actually an elongated tooth. They are often referred to as the unicorn of the sea.

name: Owl
description: nocturnal birds of prey known for their distinctive hooting calls and large eyes. They have excellent night vision and are skilled hunters.

name: Penguin
description: are flightless birds primarily found in the Southern Hemisphere. They are known for their distinctive black and white coloring and their ability to swim efficiently.

name: Quokka
description: small marsupial native to Australia, known for its friendly demeanor and smiling face. They are herbivorous and often found in social groups.

name: Rhinoceros
description: is a large, thick-skinned herbivore known for its horn(s) on its snout. They are primarily found in Africa and Asia and are critically endangered due to poaching.

name: Shark
description: a diverse group of cartilaginous fish known for their sharp teeth and keen sense of smell. They play a crucial role in marine ecosystems as apex predators.

name: Urial
description: is a wild sheep found in Central and South Asia, known for its curved horns and agile nature. They inhabit mountainous regions and are social animals.

name: Vulture
description: scavenging birds known for their role in the ecosystem as cleaners. They have excellent eyesight and can soar at great heights to spot carrion.

name: Wolf
description: a social carnivore known for its pack behavior and complex social structures. They are found in various habitats and are known for their howling communication.

name: Xerus
description: is a type of African ground squirrel known for its bushy tail and social behavior. They live in colonies and are primarily herbivorous.
